mito -use http,collections src.cel
! stderr .
cmp stdout want.txt

-- src.cel --
post_request("http://www.example.com/", "text/plain", "request data").do_request().drop([
	"Header.Cache-Control",
	"Header.Date",
	"Header.Etag",
	"Header.Expires",
	"Header.Last-Modified",
	"Header.Server",
])
-- want.txt --
{
	"Body": "",
	"Close": false,
	"ContentLength": -1,
	"Header": {
		"Accept-Ranges": [
			"bytes"
		],
		"Content-Type": [
			"text/html; charset=UTF-8"
		],
		"Vary": [
			"Accept-Encoding"
		]
	},
	"Proto": "HTTP/1.1",
	"ProtoMajor": 1,
	"ProtoMinor": 1,
	"Request": {
		"Close": false,
		"ContentLength": 12,
		"Header": {
			"Content-Type": [
				"text/plain"
			]
		},
		"Host": "www.example.com",
		"Method": "POST",
		"Proto": "HTTP/1.1",
		"ProtoMajor": 1,
		"ProtoMinor": 1,
		"URL": "http://www.example.com/"
	},
	"Status": "200 OK",
	"StatusCode": 200,
	"TransferEncoding": [
		"chunked"
	],
	"Uncompressed": true
}
